description: Entertaining at home and looking for platter ideas? This step-by-step recipe shows you how to create the ultimate grazing platter to wow all your guests.
name: The Ultimate Entertainerâ€™s Platter Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 170g Thomas Dux hommus with roasted garlic & truffle oil dip
150g Thomas Dux black & green olives with orange & coriander
150g Thomas Dux Australian semi dried tomatoes & fetta
170g Thomas Dux basil pesto with grana padano & roasted cashew dip
200g Thomas Dux English red Leicester cheese
500g green grapes, cut into small bunches
1 yellow nectarine, destoned, cut into thin wedges
130g Woolworths artisan style seeds & grains crispbread
130g Woolworths artisan style rosemary & sea salt crispbread
1 loaf crafted bakery dark rye sourdough, thickly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Place hommus in a small serving bowl and drizzle with half the oil. Place olives in another small bowl and drizzle with remaining oil. Scatter olives with 2 thyme sprigs and season with pepper.

Place semi dried tomatoes & fetta in a small bowl. Place blue cheese on a plate. Scatter with pomegranate seeds and a few chopped pecans. Place pesto dip in a small bowl and top with basil sprigs. Place beetroot relish in a small bowl.

Place brie on a large serving board and drizzle with honey. Top with rosemary. Place hommus, cheddars, red Leicester and salami on board, then arrange radish, fresh cucumbers, grapes, pickled cucumbers, figs, strawberries, nectarine, cherries, blueberries, apricots, pistachios and remaining thyme on board. Place grissini, crispbreads, crackers and bread on board and serve.
